text: The Alfa Romeo 164 is a car produced by Alfa Romeo. It replaced the Alfa Romeo 90 in 1987 and was sold is the US between the 1991 and 1995 model years with the brand not returning there until the launch of the Giulia for the 2017 model year. It was discontinued in 1997 and replaced by the Alfa Romeo 166 in 1998. == Engines == * 2.0 Twin Spark 105 kW (143 hp), 106 kW (144 hp), 107 kW (146 hp) and 109 kW (148 hp) * 2.0 Twin Spark Turbo 129 kW (175 hp) * 2.0 V6 Turbo 148 kW (201 hp) * 3.0 V6 132 kW (180 hp), 135 kW (184 hp), 141 kW (192 hp) and 147 kW (200 hp) * 3.0 V6 24V 154 kW (210 hp), 168 kW (228 hp) and 171 kW (232 hp) * 2.5 TD 86 kW (117 hp) and 92 kW (125 hp) 164 Category:1980s automobiles Category:1990s automobiles
title: Alfa Romeo 164
